mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Margaret Comegys, 1861 February 25
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Margaret Comegys, Vice Regent for Delaware, February 25, 1861. Private. Portion of letter clipped off. Includes typed transcript. Rosemont. Secretary Tracy fails to locate Alexandria Gazette item. Mother opposes Regent's going to Mount Vernon. Refuses to resign. Plan for railroad from Alexandria to Mount Vernon unsuccessful. Secretary Tracy lives with Washington friends 2 1/2 mos. Reducing Association expenses
